box

Class DialogBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • box.DialogBox
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleDialogBox

    public abstract class DialogBox
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing the Dialogbox.
    Author:
    Afraz Salim
